item.title: Invasion Defense vs. Invasion Preparations
item.content:encoded: So, if Invasion Defense now takes 6 hours to come into effect, and Invasion Preparations still takes 4 hours, isn't Invasion Defense now nearly useless save for deterring repeat invaders, or maybe catching a village that doesn't have anyone to invade when the Invasion Prep. timer finishes?
